alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:57PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the lower elevations and 10 to 17 inches over Lolo and Lost Trail Passes. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph on Tuesday afternoon with potential for snow squalls. * WHERE...Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Lolo Pass, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
